links.title: NASCAR driver Brandon Brown partners with LGBCoin amid chant craze
links.description: NASCAR driver Brandon Brown will have a new primary sponsor for the 2022 season. Brown partnered with LGBCoin for the next year and the cryptocurrency will have a big spot on the the No. 68 Chevrolet Camaro for all 33 races of the NASCAR Xfinity Series (NXS).
